description:
Hypnosis for sales mastery  guided hypnosis session has been created to simulate a private hypnosis session here with me.

Hypnosis can help you  If you have been having trouble meeting sales targets and lack motivation and negotiation skills to close deals and make those sales. This is the course for you because with hypnosis sometimes called magnified concentration you can create new solid foundations in your thinking of what is necessary for you to maximize your sales results with a new mental attitude and feel more motivated as a sales master negotiator and always knowing what to say and when to say it to close the deal and make that sale.

What I will teach you in this course

1. You will begin by creating an image in your mind of what you want so that you will know where you are going and what you want to be successful at.

2. How hypnosis will work for you

3. learn how your mind and body work together with some fun but important lessons that will improve the results of this hypnotherapy session.

4. Learn how you naturally resist changes even changes that can be very good for you

5. Learn just how powerful words can be and their effect on you physically even if they are only self talk.

6. Learn who can and cannot be hypnotized

7. Learn how you can feel amazing any time you want to

8.  Hypnosis  course bonus section

1. Sales Mastery Hypnosis

2. Assertiveness Hypnosis

How to use and apply EFT in the bonus section an amazingly powerful technique that can eliminate any limiting bad feelings also

1. Release Negative Beliefs That Sabotage Your Abundance

2. Release Self Sabotaging Feelings Of Guilt

All Files and videos are downloadable for easier access
title: Hypnosis for sales mastery  guided hypnosis session
